## DateFormatter.getWeekday() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getWeekday(weekday?: number, format?: WeekdayFormat, locale?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  weekday | number | The number of the weekday, defaults to Sunday |
|  format | [WeekdayFormat](./fast-foundation.weekdayformat.md) | The formatting for the weekday label |
|  locale | string | The locale data used for formatting |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

- A formatted weekday label
